title: Taste This
description: Salty or sweet, can you guess how these foods taste? Students learn about the variety of tastes available in foods. A table of contents and index are included in this interesting nonfiction book. Detailed, supportive photographs and repetitive phrases support early readers.
meta: bitter, flavor, salty, sour, sweet, taste
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Segment Onset and Rime : Segment onset and rime

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
